item.title: My Personal Portfolio
item.description:
Project Overview

This is the very site you are looking at right now! I decided to migrate from a purely static HTML/CSS setup to Hugo to make content management easier and to improve my workflow.

Features

  • Fast Loading: Built as a static site for near-instant load times.
  • Markdown Powered: I can write blog posts and project updates in simple Markdown.
  • Custom Styling: Styled with a dark purple/blue aesthetic (#0f172a) to match my personal brand.

Tools Used

  • Hugo: The static site generator.
  • GitHub Pages: For hosting the live site.
  • CSS3: Custom variables for easy theme swapping.

Why Hugo?

I wanted a system that was “set it and forget it.” With Hugo, I don’t have to worry about database vulnerabilities or slow server-side rendering. I just push my Markdown files, and the site updates automatically.
